comments:
Driver:  I04060720

The first 3 pages of the Web services wizard and Web services client wizard had been reworked.  There's a few major problems:

1. When creating Web service and selecting to test client  clicking Finish resulted in NPE.

- make sure to move the client slider to Test and workaround problem 2 and 3 listed below.

- Here's the exception:


java.lang.NullPointerException
    at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Path.<init>(Path.java:180)
    at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.WorkspaceRoot.getProject(WorkspaceRoot.java:162)
    at org.eclipse.jem.util.emf.workbench.ProjectUtilities.getProject(ProjectUtilities.java:728)
    at org.eclipse.jst.ws.internal.consumption.ui.widgets.test.wssample.AddModuleDependenciesCommand.createSampleProjects(AddModuleDependenciesCommand.java:139)
    at org.eclipse.jst.ws.internal.consumption.ui.widgets.test.wssample.AddModuleDependenciesCommand.execute(AddModuleDependenciesCommand.java:70)
    at org.eclipse.jst.ws.internal.consumption.ui.widgets.test.ClientTestDelegateCommand.commandFactoryExecution(ClientTestDelegateCommand.java:108)
    at org.eclipse.jst.ws.internal.consumption.ui.widgets.test.ClientTestDelegateCommand.execute(ClientTestDelegateCommand.java:85)
    at org.eclipse.wst.command.internal.env.core.fragment.CommandFragmentEngine.runCommand(CommandFragmentEngine.java:413)
    at org.eclipse.wst.command.internal.env.core.fragment.CommandFragmentEngine.visitTop(CommandFragmentEngine.java:353)
    at org.eclipse.wst.command.internal.env.core.fragment.CommandFragmentEngine.moveForwardToNextStop(CommandFragmentEngine.java:251)

2. The initial selection is not showing up in first page (need to click Browse to get the service implemation).

3. Client project is defaulted to the service project (rather than <service project>Client.  That means the Java files generated for client proxy is overwriting the service bean unless the user use the Client Project in Summary to change the client project.

Created an attachment (id=37928)
Patch for jst.ws.creation.ui

This patch fix the NPE in Client Test in the service + client scenario.
Patch to fix NPE in client test in service + client scenario has been committed.  It will be released later on this afternoon.

Created an attachment (id=37938)
update for project defaulting

Created an attachment (id=37947)
Update to project defaulting patch

Update passing project from WebServiceClientTypeWidget to ClientWizardWidget.  This replaces the previous patch from Joan.

Patch to project defaulting committed.

Both patches to problem 1 and 3 have been released as v200604062321.

Bug 135415 had been opened to track problem #2.
